Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to freezing eligible homeowners' and renters' ground rent in the Battery Park project area
Summary: Relates to freezing eligible homeowners' and renters' ground rent in the Battery Park project area; provides for a rebate program; provides for a process for application and certification.
LawCode: Amd ยง1974-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to freezing eligible homeowners' and renters' ground rent in the Battery Park project area
